attributes.action: Petition to remove the knighthood from Robert Mugabe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Robert Mugabe is a criminal. He is destroying the country of Zimbabwe and the people who live there are in turmoil. The Conservative government decided to make him a Sir. Let's strip him of this knighthood and make the world take action against this monster.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
